meanings.sent1: She tricycled around the park with a big smile.
meanings.sent2: He tricycled to the store to buy some candy.
meanings.sent3: The clown tricycled in circles, making everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts tricycled back to the carefree days of childhood.
meanings.sent5: The little girl tricycled so fast, it felt like flying.

meanings.sent1: They tricycled together in the playground every afternoon.
meanings.sent2: The children tricycled happily in the park.
meanings.sent3: The delivery person tricycled swiftly to drop off the package.
meanings.sent4: His mind tricycled through memories of learning to ride a tricycle.
meanings.sent5: The siblings tricycled around the neighborhood, exploring new places.

meanings.definition: Made a tricycle move by pedaling.
meanings.sent1: She tricycled energetically up the hill, determined to reach the top.
meanings.sent2: He tricycled slowly at first, then picked up speed.
meanings.sent3: The race participants tricycled fiercely towards the finish line.
meanings.sent4: His heart tricycled with excitement as he pedaled faster.
meanings.sent5: The old tricycle tricycled smoothly despite its age.
